mapper.sql: a.openid AS "openid", a.carduser AS "carduser", a.sex AS "sex", a.phone AS "phone", a.idcard AS "idcard", a.creat_by AS "creatBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yp_member( openid, carduser, sex, phone, idcard, creat_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{openid}, #{carduser}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{idcard}, #{creatBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE yp_member SET openid = #{openid}, carduser = #{carduser}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, idcard = #{idcard}, creat_by = #{creatBy}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
